Get start and end points of corridor edge on the network.

Source: R/delineate-corridor.R
get_target_points.Rd

TODO add description

Usage

get_target_points(vertices, area, threshold = 0.001)

Arguments

vertices

A simple feature geometry set of two points

area

An area of interest as a simple feature

threshold

A numeric value

Value

A simple feature geometry set of two points
